alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 12:29PM MST until December 02 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Washington County in northeastern Colorado... Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 300 PM MST. * At 1228 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Cope to 6 miles north of Flagler to 5 miles north of Limon, or along a line extending from 21 miles north of Stratton to 13 miles northwest of Seibert to 66 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 360 and 389. Locations impacted include... Limon, Hugo, Otis, Arriba, Genoa, Thurman, Arickaree School, Cope, Anton, Boyero, Elba, Platner, Woodlin School, Lindon, Lone Star and Last Chance. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
